content: भाविक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भावेन निर्वृत्तं ठक्] {@--1@} Natural, real, inherent, innate. {@--2@} Sentimental, pervaded by a feeling or sentiment. {@--3@} Future. --कः An equation involving the products of unknown quantities. --कं {@--1@} Language full of love or passion. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech which consists in describing the past or future so vividly that it appears to be actually present. It is thus defined by Mammaṭa; प्रत्यंक्षा इव यद्भावाः क्रियंते भूतभाविनः . तद्भाविकं <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
